mapper.select: SELECT RPM.intAID, RPM.intRmIdx, RPM.strRmCode, RPM.strMapCode, ALI.strLocalCode, MIN(RPM.dateMapping) AS minDate, MAX(RPM.dateMapping) AS maxDate FROM PLNDSTAY.dbo.RM_PACKAGE_MAPPING RPM WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN PLNDSTAY.dbo.ACM_PACKAGE_INFO API WITH(NOLOCK) ON RPM.strMapCode = API.strPkgCode LEFT OUTER JOIN PLNDSTAY.dbo.ACCOMM_ACM_LOCAL AAL WITH(NOLOCK) ON AAL.intAID = RPM.intAID LEFT OUTER JOIN PLNDSTAY.dbo.ACM_LOCAL_INFO ALI WITH(NOLOCK) ON ALI.intIdx = AAL.intALIIdx AND ALI.strDeleteYn = 'N' WHERE RPM.strDeleteYn = 'N' AND RPM.intAID IN(SELECT intAID FROM ACCOMM WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE strCateCode = '04') AND RPM.dateMapping BETWEEN '2023-11-01' AND '2023-11-30' GROUP BY RPM.intAID, RPM.intRmIdx, RPM.strRmCode, RPM.strMapCode, ALI.strLocalCode
SELECT COUNT(intRmIdx) FROM PLNDSTAY.dbo.RM_ICON WHERE intRmIdx = ${intRmIdx} AND strCateCode = '01'
